lyrics.lyrics:
“Bye” after sending you off at night
As expected I'm tossing and turning all night long
For the first time I wonder whether I’m weird
Why does this feel so different to me?
The countless days I spent alone
This air I had grown used to
In one moment it pushes right in

You warmed me up

I think about it 24/7
Even if I text you “sorry”, you aren't calling me
I think about it 24/7
I can't shake this empty feeling
It’s a long day ooh ooh
I dream next to you ooh ooh
You're all I think of 24/7
I'm burning up, going crazy, dying slowly

You're stuck in my head
And ice is stuck in your heart
What did you think of all day long?
Now it's time for me to hurt

Why are you fine all on your own
Saying you're not missing out?
You know everyone tells you you're too cold
Thinking you're too good for everyone else


You know it’s not nice, so you want to fix it
Even though it’s just you not being good to me
You're not cold, you’rejust bad to me

I think about it 24/7
Even if I text you “sorry”, you aren't calling me
I think about it 24/7
I can't shake this empty feeling
It's a long day ooh ooh
I dream next to you ooh ooh
You’re all I think of 24/7
I'm burning up, going crazy, dying slowly

The love movie scenes seemed so cliche
So why were you smiling at all of them?
I've changed since this started
And you put up with that too, didn't you?
I have nothing
And now I let the tears flow
I can't take a day, or even an hour
I miss you so much

I think about it 24/7
Even if I text you “sorry”, you aren't calling me
I think about it 24/7
I can't shake this empty feeling
It's a long day ooh ooh
I dream next to you ooh ooh
You're all I think of 24/7
I'm burning up, going crazy, dying slowly
24/7

Yeah I'm gonna, I'm gonna love you
It's like taking a breath
I'm gonna love
It's so easy
I'm gonna, I'm gonna love

I take a step back from you

Like drinking a cup of coffee in the morning

It's so easy to love you

I'm gonna love

Still like that

It's so easy for me, so natural

[Chorus: D.O.]
Like spring passing and summer taking its place

It's natural for me to love you
Yeah I'm gonna, I'm gonna love you
Yeah I'm gonna, I'm gonna love you
Still like that

lyrics.title: 내가 미쳐 (Going Crazy)
lyrics.lyrics:
English Translation

It washes over me like rising fog
I’m running out of breath, it’s killing me
My scars are getting deeper, it keeps hurting
(But it was you)

I remember the nightmare of that day
But it’s not like that this time
You’re fading away
Don’t know what you want

The fog has lifted and things get clear
All the lies pass by like a reel of film
I hate you

Woo, I’m going crazy
Only a thick scar called you remains
Not even able to erase it
I’m going crazy

Your face looks like nothing’s wrong
Baby, won’t you stop?
Your excuses are useless
You drive me crazy
The moment I blink, I get cut
At the tip of your sharp tongue, just one moment
My eyes, ears, hands, feet, so much more
What have I seen and heard till now?
Is my body even my own? I can’t control it
The fog has lifted and things get clear
All the lies pass by like a reel of film
I hate you

Woo, I’m going crazy
Only a thick scar called you remains
Not even able to erase it
I’m going crazy

Going crazy
(Go go going crazy)

My heart is racing as if it’ll explode
I wanna know what’s next
Adrenaline rush, spreading all throughout my body
Don’t know what you do to me Oh

The decision my rationale tells me is just one
But my heart is shaking
Call me crazy but I still want you

Up and down like a rollercoaster
Have I not learned my lesson yet?
I’m falling into a tornado filled swamp
I’m flailing, three times, four times, keeps repeating
I hate you
Woo, I’m going crazy
Only a thick scar called you remains
Not even able to erase it
I’m going crazy

Going crazy (Go go going crazy)
I hate you

I can’t stop now
I’m going crazy

lyrics.full_title: D.O. - I'm Fine (English Translation) by Genius English Translations
lyrics.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hoh, hoh-oh-oh-oh
Hoh-oh-oh-oh
Hoh-oh-oh-oh

[Verse 1]
The day is too long
I'm too tired
I toss and turn all night, thinking about it every day
When tonight passes and tomorrow night comes
I hope I can have a good dream and asleep

[Pre-Chorus]
The many memories and our fluttering hearts
Are they gradually disappearing from our memory?

[Chorus]
How are you?
How are you doing?
Is it the day you've been hoping for?
Like you asked me, I asked you
"I've been doing well"
Without hesitating for a moment
I sincerely hope you tell me
"I'm fine," (Hoh, hoh-oh-oh-oh)
"I'm fine," (Hoh-oh-oh-oh)
"I'm fine," (Hoh-oh-oh-oh)
With that phrase, me too, I'm fine


[Verse 2]
At the end of a long day
I'm gradually losing my way
I've been wandering all night, comforting myself
Seeing only the good things
Hearing only the good things
May I be filled with good thoughts

[Pre-Chorus]
The many promises and our precious dreams
Have they been collecting dust in our memory?

[Chorus]
How are you?
How are you doing
Is it the day you wished for?
Like you asked me, I asked you
"I've been doing well"
Without hesitating for a moment
I sincerely hope you tell me, "I'm fine"

[Bridge]
Even if you don't say it
Before it's too late, let's try it together, one thing at a time
Don't worry about things on your own
Don't regret things anymore
Even the small wishes, one thing at a time, the two of us
[Chorus]
How are you?
How are you doing?
Is it the day you've been hoping for?
Like you asked me, I asked you
"I've been doing well"
Without hesitating for a moment
I sincerely hope you tell me
"I'm fine," (Hoh, hoh-oh-oh-oh)
"I'm fine," (Hoh-oh-oh-oh)
"I'm fine," (Hoh-oh-oh-oh)
With that phrase, me too, I'm fine

lyrics.title: For You
lyrics.title_with_featured: For You (Ft. Ceaser Wu, Connor Liang, Darren Chen & Dylan Wang)
lyrics.full_title: For You by New F4 (新F4 ) (Ft. Ceaser Wu, Connor Liang, Darren Chen & Dylan Wang)
lyrics.lyrics:
Caeser Wu:
左顾右盼 像个小孩
Glancing left and right like a kid
此刻心跳妳明不明白没了节拍
Do you understand that currently hearts beats without rhythm
Oooh Oooh
妳走了过来太好看 连一刻都无法从妳身上移开
You walked towards me too prettily that I can't take my eyes off you even for a moment

Connor Liang:
为妳我拚命耍帅
For you, I exert myself to exude handsomeness
为妳我不再等待
For you, I won't wait anymore
为妳抛弃 任何事情 只求妳爱
For you, ditching anything, just for your love


All (Darren Chen, Connor Liang, Ceaser Wu, Dylan Wang) :
For you, for you
给妳全部温柔
Giving you all my tenderness
陪着妳走在妳左右
Accompanying you, walking by your side
不管任何时候回头
Regardless of when you turn around
For you
给你整个宇宙
(I'll) give you the entire universe
Caeser Wu:
只为妳赴汤蹈火
Only for you I will brace through the fire
愿与妳共白头 像著了魔
Willingly growing old with you, as if I'm possessed

Dylan Wang:
我爱乱猜
I love guessing
脾气也坏
(My) temper is also bad
却愿意为妳改掉所有的坏习惯
Yet, for you, I'm willing to rectify all my bad habits
Oooh Oooh

Darren Chen:
最特别的女孩
(For) the most special girl
就算吵架也离不开
Even if we fight, separation is not an option
就像命中注定我们要在一块
It is as if we're predestined to be together

All (Darren Chen, Connor Liang, Ceaser Wu, Dylan Wang):
For you, for you
对妳毫无保留
I have no reservations towards you
什么都说
I'll talk about anything
陪妳做梦
Accompanying you to create dreams
从此妳不再有寂寞
From today onwards, you will never be lonesome again
For you
妳的心交给我
Pass your heart to me
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Darren Chen:
每个片段 只要妳在
As long as every part (of my life) has you in it
不会放过任何笑容
I won't let go of any smiles
全记在脑海
Committing it all to memory
Oooh Oooh

Connor Liang:
被妳霸占所有的爱
All of my love is conquered by you
每个呼吸都是为了爱妳而存在
Every breathe I take is so that I exist to love you ]
Oooh Oooh

All (Darren Chen, Connor Liang, Ceaser Wu, Dylan Wang) :
For you, for you
给妳全部温柔
Giving you all my tenderness
眼神交错我就能懂
I can understand you simply by exchanging eye contact
不需要再多说些什么
There isn't a need for extra words
For you
摘下整片星空
Plucking all the stars in the universe
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh

lyrics.title: KAI (EXO) - Ride Or Die (English Translation)
lyrics.full_title: KAI (EXO) - Ride Or Die (English Translation) by Genius English Translations
lyrics.lyrics:
The darkness gets thick and fainter
The endless emptiness is meaningless
This moment will disappear when I open my eyes
I feel I can fly when you're with me
I'm on a jet stream

Speed up
Leave your body to the way you feel
It spreads smoothly, I don't know how to stop
Feel this thrill and feel free

Baby I like it, ooh
Your breath becomes hot
Out of the paradigm facing limits
The mood is deepening
You become clearer
Follow this night
We ride or die, until the end

Always bе there

I'm a little bold
You don't need to bе nervous
Everything you've ever dreamed of becomes a reality
Look around you
Tonight, it's just the two of us
Speed up a little bit more
Keep running
Leave your body to the way you feel
It spreads smoothly, I don't know how to stop
Feel this thrill and feel free

Baby I like it, ooh
Your breath becomes hot
Out of the paradigm facing limits
The mood is deepening
You become clearer
Follow this night
We ride or die, until the end

Nothing else to do
Before we go too high
As if it were there last
Ride or die
Like this right now

Baby I like it, ooh
Your breath becomes hot
Out of the paradigm facing limits
The mood is deepening
You become clearer
Follow this night
We ride or die, until the end
Always be there
Always be there
Tonight we ride or die

lyrics.title: 4:55pm
lyrics.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You gave my life color
You brought out the best in me
Held me down, didn’t let me float away
Took me in, told me everything’s gonna be okay
I could never hurt you
And I could never hate you
Knew it was time to let you go
Seeing you happier, that’s all that I needed to know

[Hook]
I’m sleep deprived, my thoughts are drowning me
The people on this side fuel my insecurities
And I just ran out of my favorite injection

[Verse 2]
You changed me forever, made mе feel so safe
But we can’t be togеther, oh I was too late
You had me at hello and goodbye
And everything in between you know I would never lie

[Hook]
I’m sleep deprived, my thoughts are drowning me
The people on this side fuel my insecurities
And I just ran out of my favorite injection


[Monologue]
You can tell me whatever and I would never judge you for what you’ve done in the past. Everybody has their reasons for doing things. I always want you to feel comfortable and open with me. That’s why I’m giving you my advice on everything. Of course there will be bad days. And that’s fine. We all have our bad days. But when I see you, I think that you’re doing great. You really are. You are so strong, and I hope you can see that one day. Please give yourself more credit for the things that you do

[Hook/Outro]
I’m sleep deprived, my thoughts are drowning me
The people on this side fuel my insecurities
And I just ran out of my favorite injection
